title: Chat Bug
body:
So i have a major bug with my chat, that is happening daily. 

1. When im 'online' and on the dashboard page where it has chat and play option it always says 'Disconnected from Chat... Attempting to 
Reconnect.' which normally is solved by me restarting client

2. When i go into champ select i havent joined the chat so all i see is nothing and i have to guess what position i am based my allies picks.

3. When  i finish a game and on the stats page it says something along the line of 'You have been disconnected from chat and this doesnt effect you joining queue'

All of these happen daily on a regular basis, I have tried repairing client numerous times and im running mac os x mavericks. Pls help

replies.body: Seems like a particular port isn't getting its information through. Have you checked your firewall to make sure that all of League's programs and services have entries which allow them to communicate to the internet?
